UniProt Entry.description: The amino acid sequence of the current peptide coincides with the part of the UniProt entry that represents a peptide precursor.

Literature.Title: Rational Substitution of ε-Lysine for α-Lysine Enhances the Cell and Membrane Selectivity of Pore-Forming Melittin.
Literature.Author: Mayandi V, Xi Q, Leng ET, Koh SK, Jie TY, Barathi VA, Urf Turabe Fazil MH, Somaraju Chalasani ML, Varadarajan J, Ting DSJ, Beuerman RW, Chan LW, Agrawal R, Sebastian TM, Zhou L, Verma NK, Lakshminarayanan R

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human dermal fibroblasts:8% Killing=500 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=215 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus subtilis ATCC 6633(MIC=16µg/ml),Bacillus cereus ATCC 11778(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis ATCC 12228(MIC=16µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 29213(MIC=32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 700699(MIC=64µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MR(MIC=16-128µg/ml),Enterococcus sp.(MIC=4-16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 29212(MIC=16µg/ml),Enterococcus faecalis ATCC 700802(MIC=64µg/ml),Enterobacter sp.(MIC=4-64µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=8µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii(MIC=2-8µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 9027(MIC=32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=16µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa(MIC=8-32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 24433(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 2091(MIC=32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 10231(MIC=32µg/ml)
